text.__SUMMARY__:
Fritillaria sinica is a Chinese plant species of the lily family. It is found in the wild only in the Province of Sichuan in southwestern China, although it is sometimes cultivated as an ornamental in other regions.Fritillaria sinica produces bulbs up to 15 mm in diameter. Stem is up to 30 cm tall. Flowers are olive-green with deep purple markings.
